original_title: Manhattan protesters chant 'globalize intifada' amid bipartisan pushback | Fox News
article_summary: Thousands of pro-Palestine demonstrators gathered in Manhattan, New York, calling for a "global intifada" and an end to aid to Israel. The phrase "globalize the intifada" has been linked to antisemitic violence, and bipartisan legislation has been introduced to denounce it as a call for violence against Jewish and Israeli people worldwide.</s>
